ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢---------------------------------------------------------------ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢

[i][b]The team behind "The Notebook" present another Nicholas Sparks tearjerker. Dear John is a heartfelt look at a long-distance relationship between a soldier (Channing Tatum) and a student (Amanda Seyfried) fighting to keep their love alive through letters. Tissues are a must! 

Over the next seven years the couple are continually separated by John's increasingly dangerous deployments, meeting only sporadically, they stay in touch by sending a constant stream of love letters.
[/b][/i]
